channel.title: Comments on: Curt Schilling is Spying on WoW

item.title: By: Karen
item.dc:creator: Karen
item.description: Curt Schilling is one of the biggest attention whores this planet has ever known. And, yeah, he knows how to pretend to be a nice guy, but that's for the rep. Just as his charity projects are pretty much about him appearing to give a shit about anyone but himself. Yeah, it's just my opinion, but I happen to know him personally. He's a dick.
item.content:encoded: Curt Schilling is one of the biggest attention whores this planet has ever known. And, yeah, he knows how to pretend to be a nice guy, but that’s for the rep. Just as his charity projects are pretty much about him appearing to give a shit about anyone but himself. Yeah, it’s just my opinion, but I happen to know him personally. He’s a dick.

item.title: By: maxxamus
item.dc:creator: maxxamus
item.description: Curt is the greatest EVER!!! how quickly Red Sox nation forgets what he sacrificed for all of us. 2 words,.... Experimental Surgery. Thank you Mr. Schilling!!! I have 9 70s, (4 years of playing including BC beta) and I will be moving a couple there to be of assistance to anything you ever need, and I dont give a FUCK who likes it or not. A buddy of mine, whom is also in BT right now, will also be moving a toon there, ( another huge Curt/Red Sox fan ) and we will have 2 70 warriors to provide plenty of protection and dps in anything you need, if you should read this!!! Well contact you!!!
item.content:encoded: Curt is the greatest EVER!!! how quickly Red Sox nation forgets what he sacrificed for all of us. 2 words,…. Experimental Surgery. Thank you Mr. Schilling!!! I have 9 70s, (4 years of playing including BC beta) and I will be moving a couple there to be of assistance to anything you ever need, and I dont give a FUCK who likes it or not. A buddy of mine, whom is also in BT right now, will also be moving a toon there, ( another huge Curt/Red Sox fan ) and we will have 2 70 warriors to provide plenty of protection and dps in anything you need, if you should read this!!! Well contact you!!!

item.title: By: Sydhart
item.dc:creator: Sydhart
item.description:
I got to play with Curt in Everquest on the Povar. He's actually a really down to earth and very nice guy.
This is probably one of the funniest interviews I've ever read.
http://espn.go.com/mlb/columns/stark_jayson/1201283.html
item.content:encoded:
I got to play with Curt in Everquest on the Povar. He’s actually a really down to earth and very nice guy.

This is probably one of the funniest interviews I’ve ever read.

http://espn.go.com/mlb/columns/stark_jayson/1201283.html

item.title: By: MMOCrunch
item.dc:creator: MMOCrunch
item.description: Just another reason why Curt Schilling kicks ass. Sox's rule!
item.content:encoded: Just another reason why Curt Schilling kicks ass. Sox’s rule!

item.title: By: ohsnap

item.description: he could always pay for the name change.
item.content:encoded: he could always pay for the name change.

item.title: By: Hehateme
item.dc:creator: Hehateme
item.description: You can ban attention whores like Schilling right after you ban attention whores who think personal chats with their friends on global trade channel is ok.
item.content:encoded: You can ban attention whores like Schilling right after you ban attention whores who think personal chats with their friends on global trade channel is ok.

item.title: By: Annalyze
item.dc:creator: Annalyze
item.description: He should get banned like the porn star who told everyone her char name.
item.content:encoded: He should get banned like the porn star who told everyone her char name.

item.title: By: waif
item.dc:creator: waif
item.description: <blockquote>is he a total attention whore</blockquote> Yes, yes he is.
item.content:encoded:
is he a total attention whore

Yes, yes he is.

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: So... is he really so utterly stupid as to think it's a good idea to publicly 'out' his characters, does he not plan on playing ever again, is he a total attention whore, or did he actually hand out some other person's character names in order to play a prank on them? Because dear god, every time he logs in now he's going to be INUNDATED with whispers.
item.content:encoded: So… is he really so utterly stupid as to think it’s a good idea to publicly ‘out’ his characters, does he not plan on playing ever again, is he a total attention whore, or did he actually hand out some other person’s character names in order to play a prank on them? Because dear god, every time he logs in now he’s going to be INUNDATED with whispers.

item.title: By: Hyd
item.dc:creator: Hyd
item.content:encoded:
Gotta wonder about that healing trinket on his hunter.

He’s been a gamer from way back. He owns a board wargaming company as well.
